CR-094 pre-review: COMPLIANT. All verification criteria satisfied.

FRONTMATTER: title="Interactive Compilation Defects" (present, non-empty). revision_summary="Initial draft" (acceptable for v0.1).

STRUCTURE: All 12 required sections per SOP-002 Section 6 and TEMPLATE-CR are present with correct numbering (1-12). Subsections 2.1-2.3, 5.1-5.4, 7.1-7.5, 9.1-9.8 all present.

PLACEHOLDERS: No TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX found. Execution-phase placeholders ([SUMMARY], [Pass/Fail], [PERFORMER], [DATE], [EXECUTION_SUMMARY]) correctly use square brackets per template convention.

TRACEABILITY: CR-092-VR-001 identified as discovery context. Parent Document correctly stated as None (independent defect fix). References include SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-004, SOP-005, SOP-006, CR-091, CR-092, CR-092-VR-001.

CODE CR CONTROLS: Section 7.4 specifies branch isolation (cr-094), qualification required, merge gate. Section 7.5 provides concrete qualified state continuity: before (c83dda0, EFFECTIVE v16.0/v20.0, CLI-11.0), during (unchanged), post (merged, EFFECTIVE v17.0/v21.0, CLI-12.0).

EI TABLE: 13 execution items covering all 8 implementation phases. EI-12 (Recompile CR-092-VR-001) correctly flagged with VR=Yes for integration verification per SOP-002 Section 6.8.

FORMATTING: Consistent heading levels, table formatting, horizontal rules, backtick code references throughout. No typos or errors detected.

Recommend approval.
